name: Expressway Productions
description: Expressway Productions is a premiere creative video production and content creation company. Expressway has prided itself in superior production quality and client satisfaction. Our attention to the needs of our clients and partners and our collaborative creative process are what set us apart in the field. We provide an award winning in-house staff of talented filmmakers and technicians from the earliest stages of conceptual design, through production, post-production, and final delivery.
